dialogue.text: Hi! What can I help you find?
dialogue.zh:
嗨! What 可以 我 幫忙 你 找?
こんにちは! What できます 私 手伝う あなた 探す?

dialogue.text: I’m building a small travel kit.
dialogue.zh:
我’m building a 小 travel kit.
私’m building a スモール travel kit.

當然. 哪裡 是 你 traveling?
もちろん. どこ are あなた traveling?

dialogue.text: A short trip, maybe two days.
dialogue.zh:
A short trip, maybe two days.
A short trip, maybe two days.

dialogue.text: Do you need motion sickness pills?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 motion sickness pills?
Do あなた 必要 motion sickness pills?

是的, 我 get carsick.
はい, 私 get carsick.

dialogue.text: Take one pill thirty minutes before travel.
dialogue.zh:
Take one pill thirty minutes before travel.
Take one pill thirty minutes before travel.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Do you need something for stomach upset?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 東西 stomach upset?
Do あなた 必要 something for stomach upset?

是的, just in case.
はい, just in case.

This 藥 幫忙 with diarrhea.
This 薬 手伝う with diarrhea.

Got it.
Got it.

How about bandages?
How about bandages?

是的, some 小 bandages.
はい, some スモール bandages.

We 有 waterproof ones too.
We have waterproof ones too.

Waterproof, 請.
Waterproof, お願いします.

你 想要 antiseptic wipes?
Do あなた want antiseptic wipes?

是的, that’s a good idea.
はい, that’s a good idea.

任何 痛 relievers?
Any pain relievers?

Maybe a 小 pack.
Maybe a スモール pack.

This travel-size pack works well.
This travel-size pack works well.

Perfect.
Perfect.

Anything allergies?
Anything for allergies?

不, 我’m 好的.
いいえ, 私’m わかりました.

你 需要 sunscreen?
Do あなた 必要 sunscreen?

Not today.
Not today.

dialogue.text: Alright, I’ll get these for you.
dialogue.zh:
Alright, 我’ll get these 你.
Alright, 私’ll get these for あなた.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

有 a safe trip!
Have a safe trip!

謝謝 你!
ありがとう あなた!
